title: Person Medium Skin Tone White Hair
description: Depicts a person with medium skin tone and white hair, symbolizing age, wisdom, or a specific aesthetic.
apple_vendor_description: This person with white hair, rendered on Apple devices with a medium skin tone, embodies wisdom and experience through Apple’s characteristic soft, rounded design. The white hair is depicted with subtle highlights and gradients, suggesting a gentle texture and a distinguished appearance. Its warm and approachable look makes it ideal for representing elders, mentors, or anyone conveying a sense of seasoned knowledge and calm.
